Post.title: Hexo Blog
Post.author: Jarvis Xiong
Post._content:
## Hexo Blog

### 1.Nodejs
nodejsc++4.8.0

### 2.Hexomodule
``` bash
$ npm install -g hexo-cli
$ hexo init blog
$ cd blog
$ npm install
$ git clone https://github.com/iissnan/hexo-theme-next themes/next
$ npm install --save hexo-admin
$ hexo new page "tags"
```
### 3.site_config.yml

``` bash
theme: next
language:zh-Hans
```
### 4.theme_config.yml

``` bash
avatar:path  
disqus:ture  disqus
```

### 5.server

``` bash
$ cd blog
$ hexo server
$ 
$ hexo server >> std.log 2>&1 &
```
### 6.

``` bash
http://localhost:4000/
or
config nginx upstream
```

### 7.Server

``` bash
$ ps -ef | grep hexo | grep -v grep | awk '{print $2}' | xargs kill
```
### 8.
[](https://github.com/jiji262/jiji262.github.io)

## Hexo Blog

### 1.Nodejs
nodejsc++4.8.0

### 2.Hexomodule
``` bash
$ npm install -g hexo-cli
$ hexo init blog
$ cd blog
$ npm install
$ git clone https://github.com/iissnan/hexo-theme-next themes/next
$ npm install --save hexo-admin
$ hexo new page "tags"
```
### 3.site_config.yml

``` bash
theme: next
language:zh-Hans
```
### 4.theme_config.yml

``` bash
avatar:path  
disqus:ture  disqus
```

### 5.server

``` bash
$ cd blog
$ hexo server
$ 
$ hexo server >> std.log 2>&1 &
```
### 6.

``` bash
http://localhost:4000/
or
config nginx upstream
```

### 7.Server

``` bash
$ ps -ef | grep hexo | grep -v grep | awk '{print $2}' | xargs kill
```

Post.title: SSH Multiple Key Switch
Post.author: Jarvis Xiong
Post._content:
>githubSSHfirstgithubSSH~/.ssh/id_rsafirstsecondsecondsecondSSHfirstSSH key

Multiple SSH Keys settings for different github account
=================================================================


create different public key
---------------------------------

create different ssh key according the article [Mac Set-Up Git](https://help.github.com/articles/set-up-git/)

	$ ssh-keygen -t rsa -C "your_email@youremail.com"

Please refer to [github ssh issues](https://help.github.com/categories/authenticating-to-github/) for common problems.

for example, 2 keys created at:

	~/.ssh/id_rsa_activehacker
	~/.ssh/id_rsa_jexchan

then, add these two keys as following

	$ ssh-add ~/.ssh/id_rsa_activehacker
	$ ssh-add ~/.ssh/id_rsa_jexchan

you can delete all cached keys before

	$ ssh-add -D

finally, you can check your saved keys

	$ ssh-add -l


Modify the ssh config
---------------------------------

	$ cd ~/.ssh/
	$ touch config
	$ subl -a config

Then added

	#activehacker account
	Host github.com-activehacker
		HostName github.com
		User git
		IdentityFile ~/.ssh/id_rsa_activehacker

	#jexchan account
	Host github.com-jexchan
		HostName github.com
		User git
		IdentityFile ~/.ssh/id_rsa_jexchan


Clone you repo and modify your Git config
---------------------------------------------

clone your repo
	git clone git@github.com:activehacker/gfs.git gfs_jexchan

cd gfs_jexchan and modify git config

	$ git config user.name "jexchan"
	$ git config user.email "jexchan@gmail.com" 
 
	$ git config user.name "activehacker"
	$ git config user.email "jexlab@gmail.com" 

or you can have global git config
	$ git config --global user.name "jexchan"
	$ git config --global user.email "jexchan@gmail.com"


then use normal flow to push your code

	$ git add .
	$ git commit -m "your comments"
	$ git push

>githubSSHfirstgithubSSH~/.ssh/id_rsafirstsecondsecondsecondSSHfirstSSH key

Multiple SSH Keys settings for different github account
=================================================================


create different public key
---------------------------------

create different ssh key according the article [Mac Set-Up Git](https://help.github.com/articles/set-up-git/)

	$ ssh-keygen -t rsa -C "your_email@youremail.com"

Please refer to [github ssh issues](https://help.github.com/categories/authenticating-to-github/) for common problems.

for example, 2 keys created at:

	~/.ssh/id_rsa_activehacker
	~/.ssh/id_rsa_jexchan

then, add these two keys as following

	$ ssh-add ~/.ssh/id_rsa_activehacker
	$ ssh-add ~/.ssh/id_rsa_jexchan

you can delete all cached keys before

	$ ssh-add -D

finally, you can check your saved keys

	$ ssh-add -l


Modify the ssh config
---------------------------------

	$ cd ~/.ssh/
	$ touch config
	$ subl -a config

Then added

	#activehacker account
	Host github.com-activehacker
		HostName github.com
		User git
		IdentityFile ~/.ssh/id_rsa_activehacker

	#jexchan account
	Host github.com-jexchan
		HostName github.com
		User git
		IdentityFile ~/.ssh/id_rsa_jexchan


Clone you repo and modify your Git config
---------------------------------------------

clone your repo
	git clone git@github.com:activehacker/gfs.git gfs_jexchan

cd gfs_jexchan and modify git config

	$ git config user.name "jexchan"
	$ git config user.email "jexchan@gmail.com" 
 
	$ git config user.name "activehacker"
	$ git config user.email "jexlab@gmail.com" 

or you can have global git config
	$ git config --global user.name "jexchan"
	$ git config --global user.email "jexchan@gmail.com"


then use normal flow to push your code

	$ git add .
	$ git commit -m "your comments"
	$ git push
Post.content:
githubSSHfirstgithubSSH~/.ssh/id_rsafirstsecondsecondsecondSSHfirstSSH key

Multiple SSH Keys settings for different github account

create different public key

create different ssh key according the article Mac Set-Up Git

$ ssh-keygen -t rsa -C "your_email@youremail.com"

Please refer to github ssh issues for common problems.

for example, 2 keys created at:

~/.ssh/id_rsa_activehacker
~/.ssh/id_rsa_jexchan

then, add these two keys as following

$ ssh-add ~/.ssh/id_rsa_activehacker
$ ssh-add ~/.ssh/id_rsa_jexchan

you can delete all cached keys before

$ ssh-add -D

finally, you can check your saved keys

$ ssh-add -l

Modify the ssh config

$ cd ~/.ssh/
$ touch config
$ subl -a config

Then added

#activehacker account
Host github.com-activehacker
    HostName github.com
    User git
    IdentityFile ~/.ssh/id_rsa_activehacker

#jexchan account
Host github.com-jexchan
    HostName github.com
    User git
    IdentityFile ~/.ssh/id_rsa_jexchan

Clone you repo and modify your Git config

clone your repo
git clone git@github.com:activehacker/gfs.git gfs_jexchan

cd gfs_jexchan and modify git config

$ git config user.name "jexchan"
$ git config user.email "jexchan@gmail.com" 

$ git config user.name "activehacker"
$ git config user.email "jexlab@gmail.com"

or you can have global git config
$ git config global user.name jexchan
$ git config global user.email jexchan@gmail.com

then use normal flow to push your code

$ git add .
$ git commit -m "your comments"
$ git push

Host github.com-jexchan

Post.title: Hexo + Github Pages
Post._content:
### **Update** [20170117] theme[Next](https://github.com/iissnan/hexo-theme-next) ## HexoNodejsGit ### Node.js [Node.js](https://nodejs.org/download/) [Node.js](http://www.w3cschool.cc/nodejs/nodejs-install-setup.html) ### Git http://git-scm.com/download/ ### Hexo ``` bash $ cd d:/hexo $ npm install hexo-cli -g $ hexo init blog $ cd blog $ npm install $ hexo g # hexo generate $ hexo s # hexo serverhttp://localhost:4000/ ``` Hexo 1. hexo generate (hexo g) public 2. hexo server (hexo s) web 3. hexo deploy (hexo d) github, heroku ```bash $ hexo new "postName" # $ hexo new page "pageName" # ``` ```bash $ hexo n == hexo new $ hexo g == hexo generate $ hexo s == hexo server $ hexo d == hexo deploy ``` ```bash $ hexo d -g # $ hexo s -g # ``` http://localhost:4000/ blog ![](http://7xsxyo.com1.z0.glb.clouddn.com/2016/04/15/FgBbsEvswR84bkwXSjIRBne9bX9q648.jpg) (hexo -v) hexo: 3.2.0 hexo-cli: 1.0.1 os: Windows_NT 6.3.9600 win32 x64 http_parser: 2.5.2 node: 4.4.1 v8: 4.5.103.35 uv: 1.8.0 zlib: 1.2.8 ares: 1.10.1-DEV icu: 56.1 modules: 46 openssl: 1.0.2g ## Hexo yilia #### ``` bash $ hexo clean $ git clone https://github.com/litten/hexo-theme-yilia.git themes/yilia ``` #### Hexo_config.ymlthemeyilia #### ``` bash $ cd themes/yilia $ git pull $ hexo g # $ hexo s # web ``` http://localhost:4000/ ## Github Pages ### Github Pages [GitHub Pages](https://pages.github.com/) GitHub username/username.github.iohttp://username.github.io master ### Github Pages GitHubGithub Pages [GitHub ](http://pchou.info/web-build/2013/01/03/build-github-blog-page-01.html) [Github PagesHexo](http://www.jianshu.com/p/05289a4bc8b2) github repo [jiji262.github.io](https://github.com/jiji262/jiji262.github.io). (git commit)http://jiji262.github.io/ ## HexoGithub Pages webgithubhttp://jiji262.github.io/ github 1. Githubrepojiji262.github.iomasterhtmlhttp://jiji262.github.io 2. Hexo -g public 3. hexo(git commit)github ### hexo deploy hexo deploy[](https://hexo.io/docs/deployment.html). github_config.xml ``` deploy: type: git repo: git@github.com:jiji262/jiji262.github.io.git branch: master ``` ``` hexo d ``` **** 1 ``` $ npm install hexo-deployer-git --save ``` 2 ``` Permission denied (publickey). fatal: Could not read from remote repository. Please make sure you have the correct access rights and the repository exists. ``` public key public key([github](https://help.github.com/articles/generating-an-ssh-key/)) ``` ssh-keygen -t rsa -b 4096 -C "xxx@xxx.com" ``` #user_id/.sshid_rsa.pubid_rsa. github[SSH](https://github.com/settings/ssh)public keyid_rsa.pub ### gitoptional git #### clone github repo ``` $ cd d:/hexo/blog $ git clone https://github.com/jiji262/jiji262.github.io.git .deploy/jiji262.github.io ``` repo.deploy #### deploy ```bash hexo generate cp -R public/* .deploy/jiji262.github.io cd .deploy/jiji262.github.io git add . git commit -m update git push origin master ``` hexo generatepublicjiji262.github.iogitgit commitjiji262.github.iorepomaster branch deploy.shGithub ## Hexo _config.yml yiliatheme\yilia\_config.yml # Header menu: : / : /archives # : /tags/ # SubNav subnav: github: "#" weibo: "#" rss: "#" zhihu: "#" #douban: "#" #mail: "#" #facebook: "#" #google: "#" #twitter: "#" #linkedin: "#" rss: /atom.xml # Content excerpt_link: more fancybox: true mathjax: true # Miscellaneous google_analytics: '' favicon: /favicon.png #url avatar: "" # share: true # duoshuo: duoshuo-key #disqusconfigdisqus_shortname duoshuo: true # tagcloud: true # # #friends: false # # #aboutme: false # aboutme: ## #### [](http://www.net.cn/) DNSGitHubIP[](https://help.github.com/articles/tips-for-configuring-an-a-record-with-your-dns-provider/)sourceCNAME ``` bash $ cd source/ $ touch CNAME $ vim CNAME # $ git add CNAME $ git commit -m "add CNAME" ``` #### [](http://www.qiniu.com/) githubhttp://jiji262.github.io/qiniuimgbed/ #### sitemapfeed ```bash $ npm install hexo-generator-feed $ npm install hexo-generator-sitemap ``` _config.yml ```yml # Extensions Plugins: - hexo-generator-feed - hexo-generator-sitemap #Feed Atom feed: type: atom path: atom.xml limit: 20 #sitemap sitemap: path: sitemap.xml ``` `http://jiji262.github.io/atom.xml``http://jiji262.github.io/sitemap.xml` #### 404 GitHub Pages404[Custom 404 Pages](https://help.github.com/articles/custom-404-pages) 404.html404.md404GitHubhexo server [404](http://www.qq.com/404/) #### about ```bash $ hexo new page "about" ``` \source\about\index.mdindex.md ```html
<%= post.title %>

http://jiji262.github.io/
- 4.0
``` #### Fork me on Github [](https://github.com/blog/273-github-ribbons)hexo/themes/yilia/layout/layout.ejsyouGithub #### ##### D:\hexo\themes\yilia\layout\_widgetzhifubao.ejs ```html


``` D:/hexo/themes/yilia/_config.ymlzhifubao ```bash widgets: - category - tag - links - tagcloud - zhifubao - rss ``` ##### [](https://qr.alipay.com/paipai/open.htm) aboutD:\hexo\blog\source\aboutindex.md ```html
![][http://7xsxyo.com1.z0.glb.clouddn.com/2016/04/15/FoJ1F6Ht0CNaYuCdE2l52F-Fk9Vk202.png]

``` `` #### [](http://zhanzhang.baidu.com/guide/index)->->->->id/d/hexo/themes/jacman/_config.xml ``` baidu_search: ## http://zn.baidu.com/ enable: true id: "1433674487421172828" ## e.g. "783281470518440642" for your baidu search id site: http://zhannei.baidu.com/cse/search ## your can change to your site instead of the default site ``` #### [](http://ibruce.info/2015/04/04/busuanzi/)`themes/your themes/layout/_partial/footer.ejs` ```javascript ``` `` ```html , , ``` [](http://service.ibruce.info/)1 ## [Hexo](https://hexo.io/) [hexo](http://ibruce.info/2013/11/22/hexo-your-blog/) [Github PagesOctopressHexo](http://codepub.cn/2015/04/06/Github-Pages-personal-blog-from-Octopress-to-Hexo/) [Github PagesHexo](http://www.jianshu.com/p/05289a4bc8b2) [cool](https://wingjay.com/2015/12/07/%E5%A6%82%E4%BD%95%E5%9C%A8%E4%B8%80%E5%A4%A9%E4%B9%8B%E5%86%85%E6%90%AD%E5%BB%BA%E4%BB%A5%E4%BD%A0%E8%87%AA%E5%B7%B1%E5%90%8D%E5%AD%97%E4%B8%BA%E5%9F%9F%E5%90%8D%E7%9A%84%E5%BE%88cool%E7%9A%84%E4%B8%AA%E4%BA%BA%E5%8D%9A%E5%AE%A2/) [githubby hexo](http://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzI4MzE2MTQ5Mw==&mid=401679929&idx=1&sn=bd752ae5ac550b4bf4dcccb1c12aa2b1&scene=18#wechat_redirect) [Markdown ()](http://wowubuntu.com/markdown/index.html)

Post.title: Mac Command Alias
Post.author: Jarvis Xiong
Post._content:
### Mac ll alias

> linuxlllallsmac os**.bash_profile**>

```bash
alias ll='ls -alF'
alias la='ls -A'
alias l='ls -CF'
```

>  source .bash_profile.

Post.title: Linux Grep
Post.author: Jarvis Xiong
Post._content:
#### grepgrep


```
ps -ef | grep some_string  
```
grepgrepgrep
```
ps -ef | grep some_string |grep -v grep
```
-v:grep

>grepxargskill

Post.author: Jarvis Xiong
Post._content:
#### mysql
>mysql
```
iptables -A INPUT -p tcp -s 104.194.68.242 --dport 3306 -j ACCEPT
iptables -A INPUT -p tcp -s 127.0.0.1 --dport 3306 -j ACCEPT
iptables -A INPUT -p tcp --dport 3306 -j DROP
```
